name: McBean
description:
McBean is a platform shooter game featuring 5 levels, 7 unique weapons, and a few secrets.

The demo version only contains the first 2 levels in the game.

Inspired by Cool Beans, a prototype by Chad Chisholm. Special thanks to Zack Banack, Harrk, and Nik Sudan for beta testing. In-game music by Kevin MacLeod.

Enjoy!
